verses.roman:
śaṅkha-dundubhayo nedur
divi deva-pracoditāḥ
jagur gandharva-patayas
tumburu-pramukhā nṛpa

synonyms: śaṅkha—conchshells; dundubhayaḥ—and kettledrums; neduḥ—resounded; divi—in the heavenly planets; deva-pracoditāḥ—played by the demigods; jaguḥ—sang; gandharva-patayaḥ—the chiefs of the Gandharvas; tumburu-pramukhāḥ—led by Tumburu; nṛpa—my dear King.
translation: My dear Parīkṣit, the demigods in heaven resoundingly played their conchshells and kettledrums, and the best of the Gandharvas, led by Tumburu, began to sing.
